title: Full Show (Baker Mayfield trade reaction, LeBron and Kyrie to reunite?, Micah Parsons season projections)
description:
00:00 Will the Baker Mayfield trade come back to haunt the Browns this season?
24:58 Will LeBron prove his power by uniting with Kyrie Irving?
54:22 Did last night prove the Magic made the right choice by drafting Paolo Banchero?
1:04:31 Will this trade propel Baker Mayfield to a long career as an NFL starter?
1:24:46 Will Micah Parsons be the best defensive player in football next year?
1:37:26 Which duo wins more titles: Steph & LeBron or Michael & Magic?
1:45:30 Should Cowboys fans be upset the team didn't land Von Miller?
1:50:57 Isiah Thomas tells Michael Jordan to "stop lying" about origins of their feud
